official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the last Friday of April each year as National Arbor Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the last Friday of April of each year as "National Arbor Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the last Friday of April each year as National Arbor Day.
